column2: Changes to this Privacy Statement    If a material change is made to this Privacy Statement and/or the way we use our customers' personally identifiable information, a prominent notice of the nature of the change will be posted on this Privacy Statement and the current subscribers will be notified as soon as possible.

Changes to this Privacy Statement    If a material change is made to this Privacy Statement and/or the way we use our customers' personally identifiable information, a prominent notice of the nature of the change will be posted on this Privacy Statement and the current subscribers will be notified as soon as possible.
